subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
Sentences (Criminal)
Football
Firearms
lead_paragraph: San Francisco 49ers linebacker Aldon Smith, who has recorded 42 sacks in three seasons, pleaded no contest to three felony weapons charges and two misdemeanor counts of driving under the influence.
snippet: San Francisco 49ers linebacker Aldon Smith, who has recorded 42 sacks in three seasons, pleaded no contest to three felony weapons charges and two misdemeanor counts of driving under the influence.
